---
title: "simulateTransaction"
openapi: /openapi-rpc-simulateTransaction.json POST /
---

<RequestExample>
```bash cURL
curl --request POST \
  --url https://devnet-as.magicblock.app/ \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "simulateTransaction",
  "params": [
    "",
    {
      "commitment": "confirmed",
      "encoding": "base64",
      "replaceRecentBlockhash": true
    }
  ]
}'
```
</RequestExample>
